non-.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: used to say that someone or something is not a particular thing, or does not do a particular thing
non-.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: a non-smoker  (=someone who does not smoke)
a nonstop flight  (=one in which a plane flies from one place to another without stopping on the way)
non-.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: used to refer to a situation where a particular action did not happen or will not happen
non-.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: They were very disappointed at his non-appearance  (=the fact that he did not go to an event where he was expected).
